thread.title: More Bali flights cancelled due to ash
thread.title_full: More Bali flights cancelled due to ash

title: More Bali flights cancelled due to ash
text:
Jetstar and Virgin forced to cancel Bali flights again because of ash from Mount Raung volcano by: What are these? Mount Raung ... ash spewing from the volcano has forced the cancellation of flights and stranded tourists over the past month. Picture: AFP PHOTO Source: AFP 
JETSTAR has cancelled all flights in and out of Bali on Thursday morning as volcanic ash spewing from the Mount Raung volcano continues to cause travel chaos. 
Virgin Australia has also delayed its early morning flights “in order to assess flight conditions”, the airline said in a statement. 
Both carriers said they would continue to monitor the situation and keep customers updated as new information becomes available. Delays and frustrations ... passengers have been advised not to travel to airports until they check the status of their intended flights. Picture: AP Photo Source: AP 
“We will continue to closely monitor the movement of the ash cloud in the morning and update customers if continued conditions lead to further cancellations on Thursday afternoon,” Jetstar said in a statement. 
Customers are advised not to travel to airports for flights but to check their status on the airlines’ websites. 
The Mount Raung volcano has played havoc with flights since it began spewing corrosive, silica-based ash in early July.
